sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBInput, MDBBtn, MDBIcon, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBModal, MDBModalBody, MDBModalFooter } from 'mdbreact'; import DocsLink from '../components/docsLink'; import SectionContainer from '../components/sectionContainer'; class FormsPage extends Component { state = { modal: false }; toggle = () => { const { modal } = this.state; this.setState({ modal: !modal }); }; render() { const { modal } = this.state; return (
